TestCase.name: testFilterPushDown1
testFilterPushDown2
testLimitPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT id, time_col FROM jdbc LIMIT 3
LogicalSort(fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], time_col=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, jdbc]])
Limit(offset=[0], fetch=[3]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, jdbc, project=[id, time_col], limit=[3]]], fields=[id, time_col])

TestCase.name: testProjectionPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT decimal_col, timestamp9_col, id FROM jdbc
LogicalProject(decimal_col=[$6], timestamp9_col=[$2], id=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, jdbc]])
TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, jdbc, project=[decimal_col, timestamp9_col, id]]], fields=[decimal_col, timestamp9_col, id])
